comment: Desman is cut from a different breed of profs.  You will feel confused and intimidated by the course load, but I found if you put the effort in even if you are not book smart and show enthusiasm, he is most likely to pass you even if you are horrible test taker. oh, Marion Robert Morrison is John Wayne's birth name for all you first timers.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Best professor I ever had. He lectures on his experience based on decades of his time in  international MGT rather than talking about topics from the text. Granted you must read the text, but we don't pay thousands to do something we can do ourselves. He is very concise and easy to understand , great sense of humor and willing to converse with you on his time so as to allow you to fully grasp a topic. I highly recommend him.

By far one of my favorite teachers! He is not easy but if you read the chapters and focus on the graphs, study the maps of the world which he provides and come to class then you will do well. He is one of the most caring professors and I will be taking him again!

It was the 2nd time I was taking his class. The 1st time was not fun, but Dr. Desman is just a different kind of professor. He puts emphasis on research in all his classes. Information is his weapon. This is not an easy A class, but taking his class definitely helps in the long run. You have to be creative in this class and think outside the box.

NOT AN EASY CLASS: 5 tests, world map, 8 scavenger hunts, must read all the book and focus on little details and charts, no dull moments but the class material does not relate to the tests, he takes attendance bc he knows many people won't show up, prof is smart, I would not take him again nor i would recommend him for lazy students.

Dr. Desman is a different kind of teacher, but he will make you think. He cares about his students and that is something different that you don't quite get from anybody else. I really enjoyed his class. tests are not easy, but the guy has done just about everything in life and you would be smart to learn from him.

Exams are STRAIGHT from the book! Read. read. read! If you are lazy, do not take his class. His lectures are interesting and at times entertaining.He is smart. His class is not easy, but you will learn a lot. he's funny too.

Terrible teacher. MUST READ THE BOOK! Has been teaching the same exact lectures for centuries. Tests are incredibly hard, and irrelevant to Internation Business. RIDICULOUS, especially for an elective!

I reccomend this class and professor to all. Exams are rel. easy if you STUDY the book..Tests is comprised of little but very important stuff in the book and continental maps. Ive learned alot in this class. Oh Lectures are iffy on the exam maybe 1 or 2 questions. GoodLuck!
Class material is very interesting,however, his teaching skills are very POOR. DO NOT TAKE HIM. I studied and I got a 79.3 on the class and did not give me a B
Worst teacher ever had at KSU.  Plain and simple do not take!!!

YOU MUST READ THE BOOK TO PASS THIS CLASS. I know a lot of people say that but it's an absolute must in his class. Attendance isn't mandatory but if you don't call him and let him know he'll call you out in class. His lectures have absolutely nothing to do with test material. A little weird & thinks outside of the box. Just read & you'll be fine.
The worst professor i have had!

I loved this class, and I am taking Dr.Bob for another class right now. I will take him for as many classes as I can. He is a hard professor, but you learn alot. He curves tests and gives extra credit, so it is completely possible to get an A. I have gotten my friends to take this class with Dr.Bob and they enjoyed it aswell.

Very hard teacher. Took it in the Summer and pretty tough syllabus. If you really have time to dedicate to reading and studying countries all over the world, go for this class. If you need an easy elective, this is not for you.

Stay away from that class. The test are really hard, he usese all the little details in the textbook to test and barely mention any of this stuff in class. I took it this summer and we had a test every week after the 2nd week of class and had to learn the map of a a continent for each test.If you do decide to take it,don't take it during summer.

I'm an acct major. I took this class as one of my business elective. This class is quite hard, and this professor is not of any use to the class. He is also very annoying and weird. His tests are extremely hard, and they do not relate to the textbook or his notes. You are also responsible for knowing the maps of the whole world....(which doesn't ma

This guy reall knows his stuff. The test cover a lot of different material that you really have to dig for to find it in the book.  One thing that I liked about this class is there's     usally never a dull moment. It's not uncommon for Dr. Bob to throw out completely inappropriate commits. Its all in good fun though.  GOOD LUCK

Tests are extremely hard. 5 tests in total, have to learn almost every country in the world on a map, and the world map he uses on final exam is so old it has Yugoslavia on it. Lectures are mandatory but none of the stuff he teaches is relevant to the tests. He spent a whole class talking about camels in Egypt!
I think  he is very annoying. His class notes dont have anything to do with what he asks in the exam and his breath stinks. he drops your final grade by a letter grade based on your attendance.
Very Hard! If you need to pass this class do not take him.  He does not follow the book yet the exams come straight from the book.  His lectures have nothing to do with exams.

I took this class for only a business elective.What a huge mistake! I did everything the man told me to, I read all the chapters-and still received a C! 5 tests total: have nothing to do with lectures, they come straight from detailed trivial info from book, study the graphs. I don't recommend this man, he's smart but really pompous & A know it all
Dr. Desman reminds me of a mad scientist.  Though he is brilliant, you need to make sure you take copious notes because he shares multiple little gems that you can use in every lecture.

You think elective classes like this one are supposed to be easy? Take Dr. Bob.  He is really hard, his philosophy is to "educate" you in International Business, not "help you jump a hurdle."  The means to accomplish his expectations in terms of workload are unrealistic.  Good luck, you'll need it.
This guy su$%# - the hell with tenure - he likes to torture any student that is not a beautiful female. The degree of learning never matched the degree of difficulty he instituted in the class.
Teacher barely teaches relevant material. Doesnt follow the book (which was like 140.00). Dropped the class as the teacher didnt teach. He looks like a hippy.

Dr. Bob is the man! I heard a number of bad things about him prior to taking his course but the man knows his stuff and so much more. The class was interesting and entertaining even for 6 hours on a Saturday. Tuff but fair.
In our first class, he made a girl cry...
Hard but well worth taking if you want to really learn strategic.
he doesn't follow the book he follow 1986 book which I found it in the lib. too much information
